text: 10.19 Kis 20.12-16, Lo 5.16-20, 24.14, Jem 5.4 Pen Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nad nepan, anɨb agup, Chɨp ma ñagɨnɨmɨb, bin si bɨ si ma gɨnɨmɨb, tap si ma dɨnɨmɨb, yepɨs ma agɨnɨmɨb, yepɨs yepɨs agɨlɨg binɨb ogɨnap tap okok ma taw pɨlɨg dɨnɨmɨb, nanɨm nap takaw agɨnɨgel tek nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨnɨmɨb agup agak.
